nodes.text: The Corellian pilot Jhaka Bakarn led a starfighter squadron in the Republic Navy several generations before the Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire. Bakarn led her squadron to glory against a warlord in the Outer Rim Territories, though she died in the final assault.
Bakarn's squadron was first mentioned in the Codex entry for the Bakvalen family in Star Wars: The Old Republic, a massively multiplayer online role-playing video game released by BioWare in 2011.
